title: Standpipe changes have made mounting the hose almost impossible.

content.raw: A few weeks ago, we could mount and screw in the hose to the standpipe quite easily.  With the latest version of drcsim and gazebo, we have seen the hose go into the standpipe hole all the way, but still no point registers.
content.html: A few weeks ago, we could mount and screw in the hose to the standpipe quite easily. With the latest version of drcsim and gazebo, we have seen the hose go into the standpipe hole all the way, but still no point registers.
